description.en: DeFis Network’s mission is to build an open financial network based on blockchain technology. It enables people worldwide to enjoy safe and equal financial services. In DeFis Swap, users can freely create trading pairs between any two currencies and inject liquidity to build an effective exchange market. According to their proportion of the injected liquidity funds, liquidity providers share the transaction fee revenues generated by the transactions fairly. All these processes are transparent and decentralized.
